subject: Return order
description_text:
Hi

I placed 2 orders with Simsonn and would like to return them.

My wife has purchased other items for me as a Xmas present and I no longer
need the Simsonn items.

How do I go about returning these items? Do I need an RMA? Can you send me
return instructions please.

Order numbers are:
SSN4236 and SSN4115


Thanks

Marc

On Mon, 22 Dec 2025 at 11:32, service@simsonn.com
Hi Marc Dowie,    We apologize, but according to our return policy, we do not accept returns for undamaged products.

Hi Simsonn Customer Service,


Thank you for your response.


I have reviewed your return policy, which states that customers may request
a return within 30 days. I contacted you within 14 days of receiving the
goods to request a return, as I am dissatisfied with the quality of the
product.


I am based in the United Kingdom, and this purchase was made online. Under
UK consumer law for distance selling, I am exercising my right to cancel
the contract within 14 days of receipt, which applies regardless of your
internal returns policy.


I am therefore formally requesting:


   -

   Confirmation that you will accept the return, and
   -

   A full refund to the original payment method once the goods are returned.


Please provide return instructions within 7 days. If I do not receive
confirmation, I will have no option but to escalate this matter via my
payment provider.


I look forward to resolving this promptly.


Kind regards,

Marc Dowie
